title.narrative: SOCIAL NORMS ON INCLUSIVENESS

description.narrative: Parents and communities demand for quality, inclusive early learning and education practices, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Early Childhood Development, Early Learning, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, an increased number of marginalized boys and girls are included in quality, inclusive and multicultural early learning and education
